藟字的基本解释

藟
lěi
藤：“南有樛木，葛藟萦之。”
缠绕：“网罟相萦藟。”
古通“蕾”，花苞：“梅藟粉融连夜开。”

藟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lěi］
［《廣韻》力軌切，上旨，來。］
亦作“蔂2”。
(1)藤。
(2)通“纍”。缠绕。
(3)通“蕾”。花蕾。

藟字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藟； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1065第40
【集韻】魯水切【正韻】魯猥切，?音壘。【唐韻】葛藟，葉似艾。【詩·周南】葛藟纍之。【陸璣云】藟，一名巨苽，似燕薁，亦延蔓生。　又【本草】蓬藟，一名陵藟，一名隂藟。　又【博雅】藟，藤也。【本草】千歲藟。【唐書·方技傳】姜撫服常春藤，使白髮還鬒。常春藤者，千歲藟也。　又山名。【山海經】藟山，其上有玉，其下有金。　又【集韻】倫追切，音罍。義同。或作虆。

藟字的源字形

藟字的起名意思

藤；通"累"。缠绕；通"蕾"。花蕾。

bud
Basic explanation of words
bud
lěi
Teng: "There is wood in the south, and Ge Feng is lingering on it."
Entanglement: "The net is lingering."
Gutong "Lei", flower bud: "Mei 藟 powder melted and bloomed overnight."
bud
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lěi]
["Guangyun" force the track, the purpose, come. ]
Also known as "蔂 2".
(1) Vine.
(2) Through "tired". Entangled.
(3) Through "Lei". bud.
bud
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　藟; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1065 No. 40
[Jiyun] Lu Shuiqie [Zhengyun] Lu Youqie, sound barrier. [Tang Yun] Ge Ming, Ye resembles Ai. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Ge Ming is tired of it. 【Lu Jiyun】藟, a giant lizard, resembles a swallow azul, but also spreads over and over.　[Materia Medica] Pengfeng, one is Lingfeng and the other is Yinfeng.　[Bo Ya] Hao, Fujiya. [Materia Medica] Chitose 藟. [Tang Shu·Fang Ji Biography] Jiang smooths the ivy and returns the gray hair to the sacred hair. Ivy people are also Chitose.　Also the name of the mountain. [Shan Hai Jing] Mount Hao has jade on it and gold on it.　[Jiyun] Lun chased after cutting, sound 罍. The same meaning. Or as 虆.
bud
